channel.title: Home
channel.description: I know this is gonna sound pretty stupid...but how can i change home? also the starter outfit? I got the items for the ::starter but not what they are equipped with. Thanks to anyone who helps sorry if these questions are a little stupid.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

jesse9294:

I know this is gonna sound pretty stupid…but how can i change home? also the starter outfit? I got the items for the ::starter but not what they are equipped with. Thanks to anyone who helps sorry if these questions are a little stupid.

=) its ok your probably begging making a server even know thare are many tutorials on this ill tell you anyways
to change the place they start at (im gussing thats what you mean by home) go into player.java and find something like…

teleportToX =

then change the x and y cords =)
ok nexed–
to change the ::starter go into client.java and search

"starter

it should say something like playercommand(“starter”) or something like that i forget =)
andways it will be like
additem=###
or something this is just of the top of my head…agin
change the idem id’s in the
additem=###
thing =)
and the starter outfit is back in player.java
just seach
something like

playerequitment[playerhat] = ###

or somefin just change them id’s to =)
hope that helped somehow =)

Read full topic
